Claim: "The man is seen very well under lights."
Implication: "The man sits under lights and signs on a wall."
Referring expressions: Man, lights  Man, lights, signs, wall.
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsSeenWell(a,b)))) -> (exists c (exists a (exists b (IsSitsUnderLights(a,b) and IsSignsOnWall(c)))))
